name: Obama in the Dark
summary: Help president Obama solve the mystery of a creepy haunted house!

name: Obludia
summary: Obludia is an old-school arcade arena action inspired by classics such as Robotron or Smash-TV with RPG elements. You play as a demon hunter whose purpose is to survive in a dangerous dungeons. Fight your way through 50 levels full of thrilling action with hordes of challenging enemies and tough bosses. Enjoy mighty power-ups and deadly weapons!

name: Oberon
summary:
Oberon is a space exploration game in a multiplayer universe. You, the captain, will go through the process of acquiring a ship and putting together a crew to explore a fictional alternate dimension starting on a planet almost identical to Earth. The only real difference is that in 1968, in this alternate dimension, things went differently. The hippies took over the world and starting with policies of "no nukes" took the population down a much different path. 
 
Piloting a spaceship that uses a digital electronics corporation PDP 16 computer system based loosely on the BASIC programming language, you will use a series of ROM interfaces to pilot a ship around a galaxy of ten thousand stars and more than fifty thousand planets trading goods, mining for resources, crafting and fighting off pirates in possibly one of the most bizarre real time strategy games made since 1988. 
 
The game is largely built around crafting, everything in the universe is player craftable using a very simpler interface but with complexity beyond comprehension. The game is sure to draw in players interested in resource management and creating things. It takes concepts from successful crafting games from as far back at Exodus Ultima IV and as recent as Star Wars Galaxies. What it does not do is create repetitive and mostly boring craft/grind style gameplay and instead focuses on mining, building, experimentation and delivery of goods to market. 
 
The most interesting part of the game, at least to me, is the graphics style being based off of terminal and mainframe computers from the 1970's. Just do a simple google search on PDP 8 mainframes and you will get the gist of what to expect in game. This is analog gaming at its finest!

name: Oblivion Eve
summary:
A roguelike action-platformer where you use upgradeable weapons to combo powerful enemies to their doom!

Overcome tough fights, platforming challenges, puzzles, and more in your effort to free the titan who is incarcerated in the shifting prison's depths.

name: Obscure Figures
summary: It is a psychological horror game and walking simulator. Only half of the rooms are safe. When you enter an unsafe room, you must leave immediately. Ghosts can be dispelled with a flute or a guitar.

name: Oblitus
summary: Test your limits against a brutal and mysterious world as Parvus, a curious warrior with no memory and a heavy burden. Raise your spear and cast ancient spells as you battle hostile creatures and towering bosses in procedurally-generated 2D landscapes that are both beautiful and dangerous. Answer the call. Break the cycle. Change your destiny.

name: Oblivious Garden: Carmina Burana
summary: Oblivious Garden: Carmina Burana is a romance fantasy visual novel. Our protagonist Irell Reis was once a famous general who led thousands of soldiers to expand the land of the Magic Empire on Latoy. However the defeat in Garyalburg, Vaustiya three years ago cost him everything and he was stripped of his rank and forced to live life as a lowly peasant from then on. Finally, the time has come for Irell to recover his honor and reputation. Will Irell Reis be able to succeed in his new mission? He may first need to learn how to get along with the princesses?

name: Observer Protocol: The Station - Second Shift
summary: Observe. Record. Report. A fresh assignment on the same failing station. New anomalies. Same quiet dread.

name: Oblivion's Edge
summary: You are the last pilot on Earth, tasked with slowing down the invasion and giving survivors enough time to escape. If you can hold back the waves long enough, you may have a shot at destroying the massive mothership and saving the Earth. Oblivion's Edge is an arcade and bullet hell inspired twin stick shooter with multiple game modes and difficulty levels.

name: Object Factory
summary: Turn the simplest shapes into something extraordinary.

name: Obligation
summary: "Obligation" is a decryption game made by RPGMaker. The player learns what happened to the character by switching the character personality. Different personalities have different ideas and operations on the same item.

name: Obey Me
summary: Set in the modern world, Heaven and Hell are locked in a millennial conflict for the souls of mankind. Vanessa Held, a lowly Soul Huntress in the infernal ranks, and her Hellhound companion, Monty, will tip the balance of war with their own hands.

name: Obstacle Overdrive
summary: Cruise through a world of colorful retro inspired toys in Obstacle Overdrive, a cozy off-roading toy car adventure! Navigate fun, challenging courses, tumultuous tumbles, and enjoy the charm of a miniature world where the obstacles are as playful as the ride itself.

name: Obitus
summary:
Obitus is a role-playing game with action elements. It utilizes a first-person view for exploration, similarly to Dungeon Master and Eye of the Beholder. One of the more remarkable features is in the first-person mode: rather than having just 4 directs to face and flicking between them, there are 8 directions and the view scrolls smoothly as you turn. This smooth scrolling continues when you move forward, giving the game more of a 3D feel.

The action elements consist of horizontal scrolling areas where you fight enemies with your bow while avoiding their attacks. Later you encounter a similar type of gameplay that involves exploring castles and adds 4 directional movement.

name: Obey Me! Till Death Do Us Part
summary:
"What if you married one of the demon brothers?" theme

This new app, you won't just fall in love, you'll get engaged, tie the knot, and start your life together with one of the seven irresistible demon brothers.

Your chosen partner will be by your side every day, supporting you, sharing heartfelt moments, and-most importantly-sweeping you off your feet in a romance like no other.

Now's your chance to make this dream come true!
"Shout at us with all your love!"

name: Obey! The Game
summary: The rules are changing on you. Be prepared to obey or disobey the task at-hand. Survive as long as you can in this mashup up of microgaming and (strangely) Simon Says.

name: Obstacles
summary: Steer your car, avoiding obstacles to gain score. "Grazing" an obstacle will increase your score multiplier. Try to beat your hi-score!

name: Oblings
summary: Create crazy creatures!

name: O-Bot The Robot
summary: Destroy Evil Robots! Collect Gears! Don't get destroyed!

name: Obliterator-x
summary: A chaotic tower defense roguelike where scavenging is survival and death is just the beginning. Build, blast, and upgrade your way through mutant hordes, unlock new weapons, and assign combat drones to adapt your strategy every run.

name: Obsidian Crown
summary: ‘Obsidian Crown’ is a top-down, roguelite shooter for Windows / PC that doesn't require the player to kill everything in sight! Featuring Pixel graphics and a unique ‘karma’ game mechanic, Obsidian Crown challenges each player to find the right balance of weapons in order to complete the game, save planet Earth, and rescue your beloved...

name: Oblitacrater
summary: Oblitacrater is a twin stick shooter where you fight endless alien monsters in increasingly difficult waves. Last as long as you can, raise your score, and then escape before you are taken out. You must escape the planet with your points! Don't let the bugs get youuuu!!!!!

name: Oblivion Dreams
summary: Peek into visions of forgotten worlds and reassemble what remains.

name: Obakeyashiki
summary: Find your way out of a haunted house like a maze. A first-person horror exploration adventure.

name: Objector
summary: In Objector, you play as an enemy of the king. Join the history of opposition against ruthless power in a diverse fantasy world by facing difficulties and beating bosses waiting for you in challenging gameplay.

name: Obscuria
summary: Obscuria is a 2D Side-scroller action-adventure game with a grim ambient, completed with exploration, shooting and puzzle solving features.

name: Obby Kingdom
summary: Do you have what it takes?

name: Object Impermanence
summary: A first person puzzle game where your vision defines reality, and only the things you can see exist. Learn and master the strange behaviours of objects outside your vision. Traverse the ancient structures of a world forgotten by the universe.

name: Obsessed: Trace
summary: Haunted by loss and guilt, Arya is lost between reality and delusion as he tries to uncover the truth behind the disappearance of Valeria. The daughter of his late friend that worked at his shop

name: Obsession
summary: Obsession is a pinball game for the Amiga and Atari STE.

name: ObeyE
summary: In ObeyE, you will play the role of a [Fake] New-Order priest. Roguelike combat, build your fortifications while planting magical plants. Craft and shoot all the Enemy you see!

name: Obsidian Catalyst
summary:
Obsidian Catalyst is a tactics-style strategy RPG inspired by the Shining Force series, with influence from Fire Emblem, Dark Savior, Final Fantasy and Skies of Arcadia.
You will be leading a squad of 12 members, among over 50 hand-crafted playable characters as you discover the secrets behind the Obsidian Catalyst.

name: Obsessive Revenge
summary: After Mike's brother is arrested, victim of false accusations, Mike discovers that Jonathan was responsible for his brother's arrest, and so decides to kill him on a government ranch, where several government agents belonging to the witness protection service are.

name: Obey Me!: One Master to Rule Them All
summary:
"Obey Me! One Master to Rule Them All" is a romance simulation and RPG card mobile game produced by NTT Solmare Corp. It is one of many dating simulation games from a dating sim brand called Shall We Date?

Users can experience a story filled with a variety of characters. There is a phone and messaging system as well as entertaining card battles involved. Get through a series of tasks and choose how you wish to enjoy your life in the Devildom!

name: Observer
summary: Observer is a 3D hand-drawn cartoon roguelite game. You will become the legendary heroes of the forest, choose a new destiny for them, and guard this mysterious forest for them.

name: Oblitus Casa
summary: Oblitus Casa is the culmination of Treasure Island's legacy and is the official final chapter in the FNaTI story. With new gameplay, better graphics, and atmospheric sound design, we promise to bring FNaTI to its ultimate conclusion. Welcome back to the island.

name: Obama Narnia: El Retorno de la Bruja
Oblivion Lost Remake: Vector of Alienation
summary: The main feature of this modification is the professional interpretation of build stalker's storyline - turning the game into a true intellectual science fiction thriller with a deep and detailed core scenario and a lot of secondary twists and turns. Restoration of the plot content was based on many design documents of Oblivion Lost and attempted creating a cumulative, organic plot by combining the most interesting ideas of the project's changing storyline over different years

name: Obey
summary:
Obey is an asymmetrical multiplayer game.

We've all played games where you send commands to teammates or AI units.
Obey instead puts you in the position to command your enemies (human opponents), and to be commanded by them. Players are always free to obey/disobey. It is up to players to deal with the consequences of thier own decisions in the game.

name: Obnulenie
summary: A dark retro-style Souls-like where defeating bosses brings more than victory — uncover hidden pleasures along the way. Fight deadly foes, explore a crumbling kingdom, and unlock explicit, animated NSFW scenes — all by choice.

name: Obsccurus Somulum
summary: Obsccurus Somulum is a third-person horror game where you play as Jhon Murphy, a man who is about to experience true hell in search of his only sister.

name: Obscurium
summary: Obscurium is a 3rd-person point-and-click adventure. You guide the protagonist, Red Cross Nurse Mary Wellsley, as she explores rooms collecting items and solving simple puzzles. All the while she unravels the mystery of this bizarre place and the fate of her fellow nurse and closest friend, Nancy.

name: Oblivion Tesseract VR
summary: Oblivion Tesseract is a VR game, performed with FPS mode, which differs from the old-school TD games. Your target is to protect the Tesseract and to survive from fierce monsters, with different types of guns, grenades and immense mass energy turrets! Tesseract can absorb the abilities of the bosses you defeated! Explore the Tesseract’s history as a brave guardian!

name: Obscurite Magie: The Blood of Kings
summary: Lietta Fane, a swordswoman and adventurer, is on a mission to find the killer of her swordmaster who raised her like a father.

name: Obsidian Moon
summary: Investigate your way in this branching noir horror detective game. Discover dark secrets through genre-bending clue mechanics while navigating a world where Lovecraftian horrors blend with ancient Minoan and Kawirian mysteries. Uncover a sinister plot and face an ultimate choice.

name: Observer: System Redux - Deluxe Edition
summary: The Deluxe Edition includes The game Observer: System Redux, an Original Soundtrack with a new track by Arkadiusz Reikowsk, The Art of Observer: System Redux, an official album that will lead you through the dystopian world of the year 2084.

name: Observation
summary: Observation is a sci-fi thriller uncovering what happened to Dr. Emma Fisher, and the crew of her mission, through the lens of the station’s artificial intelligence S.A.M.

name: Observer Protocol: The Station - Final Shift
summary: Familiar feeds. New rooms. The end of your watch—unless the station has other plans.

name: Object-37
summary: The game takes place in the near future in Freak Squad's office. During the game, the player will to walk around the office, as well as meet one interesting streamer, who has changed a lot (or not so much) with time. The game is made in the escape-horror genre, where the player has to get out of a closed location, trying not to get caught by its unfriendly inhabitant. Of the tools, the player will only have a weak flashlight and his own microphone, with which he can open doors. However, it is worth remembering that the microphone can both help and harm, forcing you to pay too much attention to you.

name: Obscured Stories: The Resentment
summary: The Resentment is a psychological horror game that follows Lisa Parker through a traumatic event.

name: Obey the Voice
summary: You are here to listen to The Voice, do what he says. But don't listen to other voices...

name: Oberion: Arena Arcana
summary: Oberion: Arena Arcana blends narrative and tactical combat in a tabletop experience where every choice matters. Explore stories, engage in strategic PvE and PvP duels, and shape your own playstyle as you collect new heroes, abilities, and gear.

name: Obrii
summary: A turn-based strategy game focused on building and managing a Mars colony, featuring meticulously handcrafted missions and a procedurally generated sandbox mode.

name: Observer: System Redux - Day One Edition
summary: Observer: System Redux is the definitive vision of the award-winning cyberpunk thriller, rebuilt and augmented for the next generation. System Redux offers expanded gameplay, which includes new game mechanics, new secrets to find, redesigned stealth, additional neural interrogations, and quality-of-life improvements made with the help of the Observer community. Veteran Observers can also dive deeper into this dystopian reality thanks to three brand-new side cases to solve, adding another layer of depth to the game’s story while exploring thought-provoking themes of a future that soon might become our present.

name: Observance of Homeland
summary: A minimalistic free-exploration metroidvania with quick, responsive movement and an extremely diverse cast of bosses.

name: Obscuritas
summary: When Sarah inherits her great-uncle's old country home, she has no idea about the dark secret she has stumbled upon and into what obscure world it will take her to. Help Sarah solve the mystery and escape the malicious clutches of the old mansion. Fear is a constant companion on your journey. No matter the dark shadows lurking behind every corner, creeping beasts or demons from another dimension: You have to face your greatest fears to defeat the darkness.

name: Oblitus Mortis
summary: Metroidvania, Pixel art set in a world full of legends and myths of Venezuela. Explore various settings, face mythical creatures and discover ancient secrets in this incredible odyssey.

name: Oblivion Override
summary: In this fast-paced roguelike side-scroller, hack and slash your way through the Dulce Base as Crimson the combat robot. Unleash fierce rhythmic attacks, customize and retrofit your build whenever, and uncover the true past of a post-apocalyptic robotic civilization…

name: Obsessed With The Streets
summary: A next-gen open world street racing game. Defeat your rivals, earn their cars, customize them, repeat!

name: Obliteracers
summary: Intergalactic party racing mayhem! Obliteracers is an award-winning same-screen party racer for up to 16 players. Race brutal-cute aliens on exotic planets, using weapon powerups and physics-based vehicles to annihilate your competition in frantic round-based combat. Connect spare gamepads, laptops and smart devices as extra controllers. Stragglers will be eliminated... only one alien shall prevail!

name: Obreno: Chapter One
summary: An interactive novel. In the distant future, a search for a missing brother leads to a journey through an intergalactic civilization that may have reached the limits of progress.

name: Obgob
summary: An auto-chess roguelike, Obgob is a ecstatic auto battler where your units synergize with the artifacts you select to make outrageous builds. Experiment, adapt, and develop new strategies as you craft powerful combos and play the game your way.

name: Obama Alien Defense
summary: President Obama stars in this exciting game in which he defends against a huge alien invasion. Help the President battle the space aliens to save the world. Use the arrow keys to move and the Z button to shoot.

name: Objects in Space
summary: Objects in Space is a modempunk stealth space-trading game set in Apollo, a huge cluster of star systems dozens of lightyears away from earth. You are a lonesome ship's captain, buying and selling wares in order to keep your bucket of bolts afloat and stay one step ahead of pirates, organized criminals, corrupt governments and shady laws.

name: Obec
summary: Obec is a 3D roguelike action boss combat game where you strategize creative ways to defeat bosses, unlocking new fights, skills, and areas. Navigate the purgatory Prison as Sophia, a soul seeking purification, and conquer Wardens in dynamic, combo-oriented battles.

name: Obstacle Challenge
summary: This game is not just entertainment, but also a part of your journey of self-discovery. Are you ready? Overcome the obstacles, challenge yourself, and feel the freedom that comes with success!

name: Obscura
summary: Obscura is a first-person investigation game where, you play a medium who must solve cold cases by interacting with various elements and performing rituals. Learn about their past to understand their motives and crack the case. Please understand that the game will features sensitive topics.

name: Obscure Doubt
summary: An indie game developed using the RPG Maker MV engine. You were killed. You were erased. Can you get revenge?

name: Obara no Kiritsu: UAV Practical Simulator
Object Wars
summary: The war is small, in Object Wars fights the other players with weapons like a toothpick launcher, the last one alive wins the game.

name: Obsessed: Night Shift
summary: A PSX Inspired horror game where you must work and cook at a shop late at night and the horrors that comes with it.

name: Obelus Manor
summary: Lose your mind in an ever-changing labyrinth full of spirits and paranormal forces. Uncover the secrets of an abandoned manor in this hand-drawn first person dungeon crawler.

name: Obama Boss Fight
summary: In the world where all answers were told the great enemies confronted each other. The time has come. Time to defeat Obama once and for all. Will the world be free from racism or you will start a new era? It is up to you. But keep in mind... Obama has no chill.

name: Obergenie
summary:
As simple as Sudoku, as tactical as chess!
This fast-paced arcade puzzle game will get your gray cells firing. One mistake can make the difference between victory and defeat as you take on ever new brain teasers alone or against an opponent!

name: ObsCure
summary:
For some time now, Leafmore High School has been the setting for unexplained disappearances. In this survival horror game, you take control of a group of 5 American students. With your friends, you try to unravel the mysterious happenings at this unremarkable-looking school. The night will be long and survival will not be easy...

A few years ago, strange things started occurring in the usually quiet American school of Leafmore. Some students are said to have heard awful screams, and there is the talk of mysterious disappearances. After one of their friends mysteriously disappears, a group of students decides to investigate the disturbing events. One evening after class, they stay behind and are locked inside the school, determined to discover what is going on. Down long, dimly-lit corridors and in dark classrooms, Shannon, Kenny, Ashley, Stan, and Josh will try to find out why their school has become so terrifying - and will try to stay alive.

name: Obscura
summary: Descend under a mountain to the marketplace below, where everything has a price. Meet the four men who can each give you what you need, but beware: they have their own hidden motives and uses for you. OBSCURA is a dark fantasy romance VN that asks how far you'll go to get what you need.

name: Objective H.A.S.T.E.: Survival Horror Escape
summary: Objective H.A.S.T.E. - is a first-person 3D survival game in the horror genre. Have you ever imagined that your school could be under attack by terrorists, so the only good thing would be that the lessons would be canceled? I bet you did. This game can allow you to visit such a situation.

name: Obscure Horrors
summary:
8 obscure horror games, based on surrealism, psychology, depression, fantasy, existentialism, analog horror and fear of all kinds.

Ossa:
A surreal psychological horror game about the mind escaping from a dying body.

Mosquito Face:
A psychological horror game about John and the invasion of mosquitoes.

Timore Solum:
Short horror game about sadness.
Stay. Cry.

Queen Of Cards:
The game that tells you your future.
Play at your own risk.

Dia:
There is nothing scary ahead.
No sudden noises.
No flashing images.
No one will follow you.
Welcome to Dia.

Garrison Broadcast:
An existential horror game about a post-apocalyptic technology driven world.

From Me, To You:
'Death is an opportunity'

Analog Sammelot:
Analog horror in a dark dungeon, answer the questions on the TV screen and maybe you'll be set free.

The collection comes with a launcher game, featuring each game as an in-game physical box, bringing the retro atmosphere and visuals.

name: Obitus
summary: Obitus is a multiplayer survival game where players are thrown into a deadly wilderness. Scavenge for weapons, avoid traps, and eliminate your opponents – only one will survive. Inspired by Hunger Games, it combines strategy, tension, and life-or-death combat.

name: Obscurite Magie 3: The Divine Stones
summary: Cialis of the Royal Knights of Alzario is ambushed by an evil group of heretical fanatics that call themselves Regalus. Backed into a corner and on the verge of defeat, she has no choice but to form a pact with the spirit named Myuei to fend off the heretical fanatics.

name: Obscurite Magie: The City of Sin
summary: A classic-style, turn-based RPG. After her precious family dagger is stolen, Louise tracks the thieves to the infamous town of Ruedidalia. But her situation becomes even more difficult when she is tasked with incredibly tough bounties.

name: Observa
summary: Alone on a floating island in deep space, you use your telescope to study the universe, capture what you find, and confront the growing sense that something out there is aware of you.

name: Observer Protocol: The Station - First Shift
summary:
Welcome to The Station Observation Protocol — a remote outpost orbiting the edge of deep space, where something has gone very wrong.

You are not the hero. You don’t explore. You don’t fight. You watch.

The Station is a minimalist anomaly-spotting game where you monitor a network of surveillance cameras, flipping between feeds to identify subtle changes. A chair moves. A shadow lingers. A figure appears where no one should be. Your job is to catch these irregularities before they spiral out of control — or worse, before you start doubting what you saw at all.

Inspired by games like I'm on Observation Duty, The Station focuses on quiet tension, pattern recognition, and the eerie feeling of watching something... watch back.

There are no jump scares. No combat. Just you, the cameras, and whatever’s creeping through the corridors.

name: Obey the Insect God
summary: Step foot into the lair of the Insect God...if you dare. Face brutal enemies in pulse-pounding combat with digitized sprites that harken back to your favorite controversial fighting game from the ’90s that your mom’s hairdresser’s kid let you play that one time. The castle awaits…

name: Observer
summary: Observer is a first person perspective horror game that focuses on a dark, atmospheric environment and deep story telling.

name: Obscuria 2
summary: Obscuria 2 is a horror and adventure experience created in Unreal Engine 5, where you will investigate an abandoned island with many secrets, mysteries and scares.

name: Obscurity: Unknown Threat
summary: Obscurity: Unknown Threat is a horror shooter game where a team of soldiers must survive against a hidden foe. The game contains both conventional symmetrical FPS game modes as well as asymmetrical battles vs the Obscurity.

name: Obfuscation
summary: Obfuscation is a first-person indie horror game set entirely within a mysterious house. You don’t know how you got here - or why. Explore the house as reality slowly begins to fall apart, and uncover the truth.

name: Obey Me! Nightbringer
summary: An otome game where you raise seven ikemen demon brothers to YOUR liking. Enjoy your life in the Devildom with Obey Me! Nightbringer!

name: Obscura Protocol
summary: An "spot the difference" horror game inspired by "I'm on Observation Duty" by Notovia. Analyze, detect, and report anomalies using high-tech surveillance cameras. Utilize specialized tools like night vision and thermal vision to reveal hidden dangers.

name: Observer: System Redux
summary:
The year is 2084.
In a dark cyberpunk world shattered by plagues and wars, become a neural detective and hack into the minds of others.

Rebuilt and augmented for the next-generation, Observer: System Redux is the definitive vision of one of the most acclaimed cyberpunk stories in games.

name: Obduction
summary:
From Cyan, the indie studio that brought you Myst and Riven comes a whole new adventure that will become your world.

The new worlds of Obduction reveal their secrets only as you explore, coax, and consider them. And as you bask in the otherworldly beauty and explore through the enigmatic landscapes, remember that the choices you make will have substantial consequences. This is your story now.

name: Oberty
summary: Oberty is minimal shape-blending puzzle game where you XOR-blending simple geometric shapes to make a beautiful complex target shape.

name: Obscula
summary:
Obscula is a first-person psychological horror game where players navigate a fragile reality distorted by fear, hallucinations, and memory.

Armed with only a mysterious vintage camera, you explore forgotten places and capture the unseen to uncover fragments of a haunting narrative. As the line between reality and delusion blurs, each photograph reveals more than what the eye can see.

Built in Unreal Engine 5, Obscula delivers a cinematic and immersive experience with atmospheric storytelling, fully voiced characters, and disturbing soundscapes. Nothing you see is certain — are you brave enough to document the truth?

name: Obesity Simulator
summary: Obesity Simulator boils down to "eating smart", you are at the mercy of your own choices ....... and maybe also the food flying straight at you. Eat to survive, but be wary of what and how much you eat.

name: Oblivium
summary: Oblivium is a fast-paced, violent spellcasting action roguelike featuring elemental reactions where you battle through the nine circles of hell.

name: ObsCure: The Aftermath
summary:
Two years ago, a group of young teenagers found themselves trapped inside their school. They suffered through the longest night of their lives, chased by abominable creatures created by their principal. Some of them survived that terrible night, while others perished. Now, the survivors have picked up the pieces of their lives and gone to college.

But all is not right at Fallcreek University: strange flowers suddenly appear everywhere on the campus, flowers that contain a dangerous substance that induces strange but vivid dreams. A handful of students learn that the flowers are far more dangerous than they seem. When the seeds finally sprout, nightmare suddenly turns into horrifying reality...

name: Oblivity: Find your perfect Sensitivity
summary: Oblivity is a tool for FPS players that determines the perfect, intuitive mouse sensitivity based on your mouse movement data and your preferences. In order to achieve an optimal result, Oblivity offers many scenarios and supports over 20 games and presets.

name: Obulis
summary:
Based on the award-winning mobile game of the same name, Obulis takes things to the next level by fusing highly compelling gameplay with outstanding graphics, music and state of the art physics effects. 
 
The goal of Obulis is to drop all of the colored spheres into their like-colored pots. Spheres are connected to the playfield using chains and ropes and the player must cut these constraints to put the spheres and the level in motion by the forces of gravity and physical interaction. The controls are extremely simple and intuitive. Obulis can literally be learned in seconds, but the puzzles will keep you thinking for hours.

name: Obsolete Souls
summary: Obsolete Souls is a turn based RPG with a touch of hip-hop! Journey through Earth Alpha with a cast of goons trying to save the universe from it's inevitable demise.

name: Obakeidoro!: Character DLC Bundle 3
summary: Thieves Alisa and Alex and Officer Patches have arrived on the scene! This DLC contains the following: • Thief Alice • Thief Alex • Officer Patches • Treasure Lantern

name: Obscurity
summary: Welcome to a dark but warm world! Obscurity is a small 2D game where the objective will be to deliver your little creature!

name: Obsolete
summary: Can old hardware find a new life?

name: ObserVRtarium
summary: Interact, immerse, inspire. Step into our virtual museum and explore our collection of amazing Space objects.

name: Obeebok
summary:
Obeebok is a 3D action adventure game where you run, jump over traps and obstacles to rescue turtles from evil wizards. Run lush woodland and swamps. You must collect droplets of water to survive, avoid traps, obstacles, and enemies.
The game features 60 levels, each with its own unique challenges.
Use your skills and reflexes to make your way through the woodland and swamps, and be strategic in order to collect enough water to survive.
The game is set in a beautiful and dangerous forest. The trees are tall and the leaves are green, but there are also dangers lurking around every corner. You'll need to be careful not to step on traps or fall into obstacles. You'll also need to watch out for enemies like wizards and their helpers. You'll have to avoid wild animals such as scorpions and spiders.
Collect droplets of water to survive and stay healthy. Beware of traps and obstacles, including wood logs rolling down the path, giant rolling rocks, and falling rocks. Watch out for spiders, scorpions, and giant fish.
Save the turtles and defeat the evil wizards!

name: Obscury: The Last
summary: Indie horror, where you have to go on a frightening and mystical adventure, as well as a notable fight for your own life. You will be able to plunge into the atmosphere where fear and danger prevail!

name: Obama 2048
summary: Obama 2048 is a clone of 2048 featuring the former president Barack Obama.

name: Obake no Koushinkyoku 10th
summary: "Obake no Koushinkyoku 10th" is a 2D jump action game released on March 26, 2015 as a sequel to "Obake no Koushinkyoku". It is a work set in "Ghost Empire" 10 years after the previous work.

name: Obliterator
summary: Obliterator is a fine, small and free 360 degree space shooter, with aim no more glorious than achieving a score as high as possible.

name: Oblige of Chaos
summary: 2D art and 3D action. Elemental Reactions. Not too big Open World. Battle , Puzzle and Explore. Life has no save point.

name: Oblivio
summary: Explore minds, uncover the mystery.

name: Obakeidoro!: Castlevania Collaboration Character DLC Bundle
summary:
From Castlevania swoops in Alucard, a mysterious man who can transform into a bat, and Leon Belmont, a honest man who wields the whip!

This DLC contains the following:
- Alucard
- Alucard Sword
- Leon Belmont

name: Obversion
summary: Obversion is an abstract puzzle platformer set in a vibrant universe of cubes.

name: Obsidian
summary: Obsidian is a first-person 3-D graphical adventure/puzzle game, in which the player controls scientist Lilah Kerlins, who has to stop artificial intelligence Ceres from recreating the world.

name: Obstruction
summary: An interactive Puzzle Game, where you control a little white cube through a journey of obstructions that blocking your way to the final secret! Hold your hand steady and thread the gaps towards your goal!

name: Obama Boss Fight: Bad Trip
summary: Obama has no chill. He has returned and you have to embark on an adventure to stop him. Everything depends on you again. There is no turning back. It's all or nothing.

name: Obsidian
summary: Arcade exploration game released on the Amstrad CPC computer family.

name: Obscure: Dark Aura
summary: Obscure: Dark Aura is the sequel to the classic survival horror game Obscure.

name: Obduracy
summary: This game is a pixelated adventure where you play as a gun-toting explorer.

name: Obsessive Love Adventure Utsuro's Diary
summary: The main character Hataro has a popular girlfriend called Utsuro who decides to one day starts a dairy exchange. The project soon turns into a hellish nightmare...

name: Obsession
summary: Obsession is a game where you play as schoolgirl Akane Reizei.

name: Obscurant
summary: A beautiful solitaire "black box" game for the iPhone and iPod Touch. This classic game of hide and seek is a puzzle where you fire rays into a grid of cells and interpret the results to locate hidden targets.

name: Obelix
summary: Obelix is a game where you simultaneously play as Asterix and Obelix maintaining their favorite Gaulish sport of thumping the living daylights out of Roman soldiers. The objective of the game is to help Asterix stun Roman soldiers simply by running into them, and they turn white from blue, while you command good ol'Obelix to throws his oversized Menhirs down at stunned Romans with a splat.

name: Obedient Servant
summary: Servant of the king or hero of the Mediterranean kingdom? What happens if an ordinary servant who cannot hold a sword decides to be promoted to the knights or even the royal guard?

name: Obake no Q-Taro: Oba Q Channel
Oba Doba
summary: Oba Doba is a Roguelike RTS that is fast, funny, and frantic. Defend your base with towers and fighters while managing your resources and upgrades. Build up your arsenal of structures, abilities, and passives to defeat the evils that await. Build, rebuild, and survive!

name: Oblivion Eclipse
summary: Oblivion Eclipse is open world souls-like action RPG platformer. Vast world, slick combat, fun movement. Slash through gods as you platform your way through a breathtaking world on an unforgettable adventure.

name: OboStar
summary: Obostar is a unique skill puzzle game. Pilot your ship and touch the colored orbs to collect them.

name: Obscure Chronicle of Dynasty
summary: This is a "fictional, but plausible" strategy role-playing game with a plot which can be regarded as a history of the Three Kingdoms in a different realm. Thus, those who have received little or no attention in the original history may blossom in this very different time and space.

name: Objective: Kursk
summary: The game covers the Fourth Panzer Army attacks against the Soviet forces on the south flank of the Kursk salient.

name: Obituary
summary: Obituary is a May 1995 Doom II megawad by The Innocent Crew. It contains 17 new single player levels, three new monsters via a DeHackEd patch, some new graphics, and an optional weapon patch which replaces four weapons. Two new deathmatch maps are included as well.

name: Obliteroids
summary: A remake of the original Asteroids but with two player support.

name: Oberin
summary: A top-down, isometric Mac-only MMORPG based off of Ultima Online which emphaaises lore, roleplaying and community.

name: Obakeidoro!: Character DLC Bundle 2
summary:
Sharlie, the feline shop clerk in-training, and Lulu, the chaos-loving poltergeist, are here!

This DLC contains the following:
- Sharlie
- Coffin Lantern
- Lulu

name: Oblation
summary: Oblation is a story rich rogue like which main character can use his blood as a weapon.

name: Obake no Koushinkyoku
summary: Obake no Koushinkyoku is a 2D jump action game featuring a system that allows you to possess enemy characters and manipulate their bodies

name: Obscure - Challenge Your Mind
summary: A first-person puzzle-platformer adventure that will take you into the depths of a little boy's imagination and his inner conflicts.

name: Obey Me: Complete Edition
summary: Complete edition of Obey Me, including the base game and five different alternate skin packs for the player characters.

name: Obocchama Kun
summary: Peculiar platform game that allows you to call companions that help you traverse the many levels.

name: Object "Cleaning"
summary: You have to get out of the laboratory, defeat monsters, using a different arsenal of weapons: from mines to machine gun turrets.

name: Oblivion
summary: Oblivion is a Yume Nikki fangame, originally developed for Dream Diary Jam 2.

name: Obelixes Tower Defense
summary: Welcome in this tower defense game, welcome in Obelixes Tower Defense. In this game, you have to stop waves of enemies with the help of ancient obelixes which attack hostile creatures.

name: Obi3011
summary: This is cyberpunk themed, pixelated love adventure text game. A rainy encounter and an inevitable cohabitation lead to a journey of mistaken identity. As a robot, your funny love adventure story with your beastmen partners unfolds from here.

name: Obelisk
summary: Prepare to face the Obelisk in this extremely challenging atmospheric logic puzzle/riddle game. Can you think outside the box and solve its mysteries?

name: Obsta-Loop
summary: The Spiritual Successor to our NES classic, Exit-Loop. Its the new most Fun-Zaniest, Insaneist, Death-Loopiest, Crypt-Pillageist experience ever! Now with power-ups, masks, Multiplayer on PC.

name: Oblivistar
summary: Oblivistar is a story-driven adventure game where you will help solve a mystery that sinks into the place you call home.

name: Oblivion
summary: A action game developed by Simon Morris and published by Alpha-Omega Software for ZX Spectrum.

name: Obsideo
summary: Obsideo is a 1-4 player online co-op psychological horror, where you and your team of priests explore different locations experiencing paranormal events in an attempt to figure out what ghost they're dealing with and exorcise it from the property.

name: Oblivion Congee
summary: An illustrated Twine game about congee, memory, and reincarnation.

name: Oblige
summary: Narrative side-scroller about a working-class mother in 1979, Hong Kong

name: Observatory: A VR Variety Pack
summary: Observatory is a variety pack for VR headsets. It includes three games and a music video: Procedural downhill racing, spacejet-horror with microscopic submarines, island-puzzling with physics-based creatures, and a trippy official music video for a song by Icky Blossoms.

name: Obey Your Pirate Queen!
summary:
Ever since your parents left to hunt for treasure, things have been quiet at home for you and your sister. The two of you carry your prized dragon scales wherever you go, connecting the two of you even when you’re apart. However, you soon find that this ‘lucky trinket’ of yours holds actual power, and you’re whisked away to a crew of three rambunctious pirates! What could these beautiful ladies want with someone like you?

After begging for your life, the pirate captain decides to grant you mercy. Her rules are easy—follow her orders and you get a shot of finding your sister. Disobey her and walk the plank! If you do what she asks, you may find a special surprise waiting for you at the end of the story.

name: Obiemnaia Istoriia
summary: Free game project about the history of Russia!

name: Obcidian Legacy
summary: Obcidian Legacy is an exhilarating hack-and-slash action RPG in which you hunt throngs of rampaging monsters one after the other. Embark on an adventure to unravel the secrets of a polluted world. Become a “Guardian”, an elite protector of the last remnants of humanity. Level up and become stronger while equipping gear, gems, and skills that enhance your ability to hunt and destroy monsters.

name: Obsolete: After the Accident
summary: Obsolete: After the Accident, centers around a young girl who experienced a serious traumatic event, which ended in the death of her father leading to her exploring a broken pizzeria and having to survive 3 broken down animatrics

name: Oblivion Eagle
summary: A light-gun game where you shoot and destroy enemies that launch colored attacks. Shoot their blue attacks before they hit the screen's edge, while dodging their red attacks before they hit your crosshair. Shoot blue, dodge red. That's the name of the game.

name: Obscure Depths
summary: Plunge into the unknown with Obscure Depths, an adventure of exploration, survival, resourcefulness, and teamwork. Each dungeon is a crucible of untapped potential, wealth of unseen opportunities, and an expedition into the unknown. Adventurer, are you ready to face what lurks in the Obscure Depths?

name: Obsidian Conflict
summary:
Obsidian Conflict is a free cooperative multiplayer Source Engine game set in the Half-Life 2 universe. 
It features a large amount of new gameplay features on all-new maps specially designed for Obsidian Conflict with focus on cooperative gameplay, as well as over hundred user-made maps following the same formula. 
 
In addition to that, you're able to play through vanilla Half-Life: Source all the way up to Episode 2.

name: Obstacle Course Car Parking
summary: Welcome to the Obstacle Course - the Ultimate Test of your Car Control & Precision Parking Skills!

name: Obama Maze
summary: Obama Maze is a 3D horror experience with the former United States president, Barack Obama. You must navigate through his courses collecting all 7 of his "Obamiums." Collect all 7 in order to leave his maze and continue onto the next until you reach the final course.

name: Observer Effect: Edge of the World
summary: OBSERVER EFFECT is a cryptic, minimalistic episodic first person exploration game.

name: Oben
summary: Join Arsen and Galla in this story of mystery, solitude and skill, across four planets full of impossible jumps and challenging puzzles. Are you willing to put yourself to the test?

name: Observation at Freddy's
summary: Observation Duty meets Five Nights at Freddy's 1 with new mechanics and a revamped story! Fend off the animatronics while searching the cameras for anything out of place.

name: Obilia
summary: Embark on a journey in Obilia, an archipelago of tomorrow dedicated to humanity's legacy and imagination. Explore this evolving world, get to know its legendary figures, and find your own place in this expansive open-world RPG.

name: Obscurant
summary: A narrative mimicry game. Observe and blend in to survive. Disguise yourself, deceive enemies, and discover the secrets of a mysterious world.

name: Obliviverse: Idle Adventures
summary: March your way to victory with tons of playable characters in a frantic clickfest to save the Obliviverse from the forces of evil! Recruit new and exciting heroes and grow more powerful with each loop.

name: Oblivious Garden: Carmina Burana - Oblivious Garden: White Day
summary: Oblivious Garden: White Day is an additional chapter which tells the story between Irell and the noble princess, Leira.

name: Observo
summary: Observo is a short third-person survival horror game styled after early-2000s game classics, with a focus on atmosphere, puzzle-solving, and light combat.

name: Obscene Mansion
summary: Obscene Mansion is an erotic detective story with elements of adventure. Reveal the secrets of the mansion and put the souls of the harlots to rest.

name: Oberak
summary: Oberak is a third-person Action Adventure RPG and Social School Sim mash-up, set in a Sci-Fantasy world with hip-hop influences. As a powerful Qi warrior, nurture your students, master skills from martial arts to crafting, and defend Ti-an from the deadly rogue clans that are on the rise.

name: Observers
summary: Work alongside your friends to collect all the cosmic diamonds in a co-operative chaotic party platforming performance. Play as one of four aliens, each with their own unique ability.

name: Obscura
summary: Obscura is a puzzle-platformer in which the player uses different cameras to find colorful solutions to problems in a monochromatic world.

name: Object Ward.
summary: Object Ward is a visual novel about the various misadventures of a man who sees everyone with an inanimate object for a head. What is real, and what is a hallucination?

name: Obzen
summary: OBZEN is a set of 32 limit removing CL4 maps for the Plutonia IWAD. These are short maps with low monster counts (100 or less, unless playing co-op) with a heavy emphasis on high difficulty, evil traps, and hard fights.

name: Obelisk
summary: Obelisk is a turn-based tower defence game in which you take on the role of space astronaut Allen as he fights monsters and guards the Energy Obelisk on this planet.

name: O-Box: Ball Shooter
summary:
O-Box is the game that you can play anywhere anytime. It fills your spare time with amazement and satisfaction.

Simply aim the balls at the floating boxes and let the broken pieces flush the screen.

Collect balls while shooting the boxes. The more balls you collect, the easier and more fun the game is.

Look for the rare Magic Ball and the Bomb. Pick them up for extraordinary power.

Download now for endless fun!

name: Object "32"
summary:
Object "32" is a single-level PWAD for Doom II, meant for limit-removing ports that was released on December 13, 2008 by Lainos. It uses a music track from Gears of War.

A difficult and dark techbase overtaken and altered by the forces of Hell, Object "32" was originally meant to be part of the Grid 32 community project, but ended up being released standalone

name: Obey the Law
summary: In this tactical shooter you lead a special police task force. Your missions include counter-terrorism, hostage rescue, and targeting organized crime.

name: Obocchamakun
summary:
Obocchamakun is a Miscellaneous game, published by Tecmo, which was released in Japan in 1991.
This board game is played by up to four players, and the victory condition is to receive a kiss from the heroine.
The map, which resembles a world map, is divided into Europe, Asia, the Soviet Union, Africa, North America, South America, the North Pole, the South Pole, and Tamba World (the underworld), and players must find the treasure demanded by the heroine among them.
Treasures obtained by other players can be taken away by physical assault or by using items.
Players can earn the necessary liking points to receive a kiss when they deliver the treasure they have found to a randomly selected city where the heroine is staying.
When the player reaches the number of points set before the game begins, the player wins a kiss from the heroine.

name: Obama
summary: Obama is a third person action-adventure game with bullet-hell inspired combat. Cleanse an unknown alien planet of the beasts that now inhabit it. Find out who is in command and reveal their ultimate goal.

name: Obscuria
summary: After the largest cruise ship in the world suffered a shipwreck and was invaded by ghosts, you must find Captain Blackhood after he disappeared, enter the great Nocturne and investigate all the secrets and mysteries.

name: Obakeidoro!: Character DLC Bundle
summary:
Maisy, with her bright red hood, and hunter extraordinaire, Hunt, have arrived!
This DLC contains the following:
• Maisy
• Visitor's Lantern
• Hunt

name: Obgoose
summary: Do you despise playing scrabble with others? The feeling that everyone knows more words than you? Well, now this time is over. Obgoose is a single-player non-competitive scrabble-like game where no one will ever know when you are obtuse.

name: Obunga
summary: You're trapped in a giant maze. There's only one way out, but it's locked. Find all six keys to unlock the exit door and escape before Obunga catches you.

name: Obox
summary: Obox is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. The game starts in Ofudatsuki's room, which cannot be exited from. The goal is to explore and collect Gadgets (effects).

name: Obsidienne
summary: A speedrunn oriented game in which you'll have to slice obstacles to beat the levels.

name: Obscurum
summary: Are you afraid of the sea and other waters? Overcome your fear of the dark and deep water in this simulator. No one will stand by your side on the open sea. Go into the water and try to survive.

name: Obama Alien Defence
summary: The world is under a huge alien invasion and you're the last hope. Defeat them and gather as many presidential coins as you can.

name: Obusite
summary: Lost in an abandoned Manor, you'll have to face your fears and sneak your way around to flee from its dangers.

name: Obscure Realm
summary:
Obscure Realm, a game for arcade players and the ultimate to test and warm-up reaction times .
With lots of ways to finish, win, lose, die, gain health, cheat and so much more.

name: Object N
summary: A classic dynamic shooter which takes place in a science underground center.

name: Oblin Party
summary: A wacky physics-based, couch/online party brawler where the hands do the talking. Utilize your elastic arms to wield powerful items, or swing, slingshot, grab, and punch to catapult your opponents off the map. Perfect for quick, hilarious multiplayer sessions with friends!

name: Obsolete Souls Episode 0: Operation Haiti
summary: Fight against King Khard and his will in this action packed "beat em' up" prequel to the Obsolete Souls RPG!

name: Obscura
summary: A new reality of fear. What you see may follow into your dreams, that will soon turn into nightmares.

name: OBJ VR
summary: An educational VR game that takes players into realistic school emergency scenarios. The game includes various scenarios such as fires, earthquakes and chemical accidents that require quick and effective response.

name: Obenseuer
summary: Obenseuer is an urban survival RPG game, where you become a property manager of a rundown unfinished tenement building, in an isolated quarantine district of Obenseuer. Maintain and upgrade your tenement for rent, uncover the secrets of this infamous district and grow your wealth with.

name: Obakeidoro!
summary:
Obakeidoro! is an asymmetric action game in which three humans face off against one monster. As a human, use your Lantern Attack to fend off the monster. If you time it just right, you might be able to turn the tides in your favor. As the monster, utilizing your powerful skills is the key to your victory. Use skills like "glide" and "track" to capture the humans.

Can you escape the monster? Can you hunt down the humans? Obakeidoro! is a game of cat and mouse that the whole family will enjoy!

name: Obsolete
summary: Obsolete is a short 2D platformer with a calm atmosphere in a very strange world where everything is deteriorating quickly. Cross the abandoned caves of this fallen world in search of an answer.

name: Obakenori
summary: Become Obakenori, a once powerful sea demon stuck in the form of an onigiri, and help him regain his former power! A 3D platforming adventure where you explore vivid environments, interact with the strange inhabitants as you gather ingredients, unlock new abilities and uncover secrets of this world!

name: Observe and Report
summary: The ultimate surveillance game. Monitor camera feeds solo, team up in multiplayer, or versus friends. Detect anomalies, report suspicious activities, and ensure security across diverse locations. Your watchful eyes make the difference!

name: Obsidian Prince
summary: Fight through dungeons in a tactical, turn-based roguelike where choices have real consequences. Recruit diverse heroes and steer them to their death... *ahem*... glory. Explore and rebuild the overworld to boost your heroes and discover hidden quests and new dungeons to master.

name: O-Bot The Robot 2
summary: Last year O-Bot has stopped an invasion on his planet and now everything was peaceful. Until some strange lavender gear in a pile of junk activated itself and shot out beams everywhere, causing every creature and living things to be revived and teleported to one planet named "Earth". So O-Bot decided to investigate and find every piece of lavender gear to stop this chaos.

name: Obliteracy
summary: Obliteracy is a word game set in a utopian future where energy is generated from language itself. Word-warriors pilot enormous mechanized robots in a tournament to prove themselves worthy of the title of Champion and to earn the chance to craft the future of the world.

name: Observe
summary: Collaborate with yourself to change the past, future and present by replaying your mistakes and making new ones in this single-player puzzle game.

name: Obsurity
summary: Discover all the secrets of two completely different worlds.

name: Obey Her or Else
summary:
You’ve just landed a spot at one of the most prestigious and costly schools in the country, but things take a turn when your father messes up at his job. Despriate to maintain your chance at a good future, your father agrees to send you away as a live-in tutor for the daughter of a billionaire!

Things only get crazier when you realize the girl you’ll be tutoring is one of your classmates—the laziest and most antisocial of them all! She doesn’t take kindly to being tutored by a commoner and couldn’t care less about you. Can you survive this new life and keep up with school, or will you be crushed under the heels of your new mistress?

name: Obby
summary: run, jump, puzzle. Your tasks that you have to master in Obby with Kitty.

name: Obliterate
summary: Obliterate is an Action game, developed by Phoenix Games and published by Atari SA, which was released in Australia in 2006.

name: Obsidian Legion
summary: Embark on a dark journey in this 2D Adventure Game. Rise to the challenge as you fight your way in a land of perils and wonders. Explore the world and collect the tools necessary to overcome the many obstacles set before you. Find the path that leads to the Obsidian Legion.
